properties.class: Human Wizard, Elven Wizard, Dark Wizard

steps.text: Talk to Bard Rukal in the Temple of the Town of Dion.
Talk to Parina at the entrance to the Temple in Gludin Village.
Talk to Elder Casian in the middle of the Wasteland.

Get the seeds: Go to the Fellmere Harvesting Grounds, hunt quest monsters Apparition Singing Flower near Fellmere Lake, until you have 1st Golden Seed . Go to Gods' Falls behind Ivory Tower, hunt quest monsters Singing Flower of Nightmare near the Ivory Fortress until you have 1st Golden Seed . Go to the Town of Giran, and then from Giran down the southern toad until the second fork. Hunt quest monsters Singing Flower of Darkness, until you have 1st Golden Seed .
Talk to Bard Rukal in the Temple of the Town of Dion.

Collect the sounds for the melody: Talk to Water Undine near Fellmere Lake. Talk to Flame Salamander in the Ruins of Despair. Talk to Air Sylphid in the Wasteland. Talk to Earth Snake in the Ruins of Agony. Go to the Cruma Marshlands, hunt Toad Lord, Marsh Stakato, collect Dazzling Drop  — 20 pcs. Go to Ivory Tower Crater, hunt quest monsters Ghost Fire, collect Flame Crystal  — 5 pcs.; hunt Reinforced Steel Golem, collect Reinforced Steel Golem Shard  — 10 pcs., hunt Reinforced Stone Golem, collect Reinforced Stone Golem Powder  — 10 pcs., and Reinforced Monster Eye, collect Reinforced Monster Eye Shell  — 10 pcs. Go to Gorgon Flower Garden, hunt Wyrm, collect Wyrm's Wingbone  — 10 pcs., and Harpy, collect Harpy's Feather  — 20 pcs.

Go to the Death Pass, kill Windsus and collect Windsus Mane  — 10 pcs. Talk to Water Undine near Fellmere Lake. Talk to Flame Salamander in the Ruins of Despair. Talk to Air Sylphid in the Wasteland. Talk to Earth Snake in the Ruins of Agony.
Talk to Bard Rukal in the Temple of the Town of Dion and get the reward.
